name: Toxapex
description: To survive in the cold waters of Galar, this Pokémon forms a dome with its legs, enclosing its body so it can capture its own body heat.

attacks.name: Recover
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon and heal all damage from it.

attacks.name: Poisonous Whip
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
